byline.contributor: Anthony Shadid contributed reporting from Beirut, and Neil MacFarquhar from the United Nations.

snippet: A decision in Syria to ban imports of consumer goods sent prices soaring and provoked outrage among a business elite that has until now backed the leadership of President Bashar al-Assad.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: A decision in Syria to ban imports of consumer goods sent prices soaring and provoked outrage among a business elite that has until now backed the leadership of President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: Facing Backlash, Syria Revokes Week-Old Ban on Imports of Consumer Goods
headline.print_headline: Facing Backlash, Syria Revokes Week-Old Ban on Imports of Consumer Goods
headline.seo: Syria Revokes Ban on Imports of Consumer Goods
